content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work on the night of august 27, 2014 around 10:15pm. i was having a conversation on the phone with a friend. i came to the stop sign on parker street and hampden road. i was traveling in a southern direction toward connecticut when i noticed through the trees south of the little cemetery on the corner 1 red light in the sky in a southeast direction from me. i didn't think anything of it at that point in time because the area has airplanes that fly to bradley airport. i always have a curiosity when i see lights in the sky. i keep watching till i see it blink or it does something else. so with this being said i kept an eye on it. i told my friend on the phone that i saw a red light in the sky. as i drove down that road there is a clearing there. in the clearing sits a field to pick strawberries at. i figured that would be a nice spot to get a good look at this red light and see it blink or something. i noticed another red light through the trees as i approached this said field. i told my friend at that point "no way!" when i hit the field i witnessed directly to my east now just above the tree line 2 solid red lights just hovering there. i slowed to a stop. there was no other traffic at that time. i put the phone down and stuck my head out the window to see if i could hear any noise. i could not hear anything. i know it wasn't moving. i told my friend what i was seeing they were in aw. i started to drive and i got an idea to try and get a photo. i got one put not clear at all. but when i was stopped i had a great view of them. they were low in the sky and each light was maybe baseball size. if you took a dollar bill and a folded over a 1/4th of it that was about the distance between the lights. it very well kind have a had 3 lights but i never saw one. in the picture it looks like 2 smaller lights. those are stars. i only got one red light.
content.summary: 2 solid red sationary lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was riding around in a car with three friends in the front passenger seat, we stopped on the rod on the coast and i saw the light, it appeared over the ocean but not to far from the coast (a couple miles at the most)  i kept observing to make sure it wasn't a star, i observed the same degree that the object was at, 360 degrees, and their were no stars out besides less than a handful barely visible clustered straight up in the sky, not even close to the object. there was a little cloud a few degrees under the object and i tried using it as a still point to observe and see if i could notice the ufo moving. the ufo appeared to be moving extremely slow. when i squinted my eyes the outline appeared to be a sliver type shape vertical with the ground. i kept trying to convince my friends that it wasn't a satellite, because i have observed many before. and since the first second i looked at it,i couldn't look away. it brought an amazing sensation to my body just to look at it, the same sensation you would feel if you felt love,joy happiness, and content all at the same time. its as if my eyes were glued to the object. i didn't even look away until a building blocked my view of the ufo while we were leaving front street (the coastal street). now i with all of this information, it is easy to infer that i could have been looking at many plausible things but here is where it gets weirder. a few hours after we saw the object, during the middle of the night(somewhere around 3 am) there was an exremely bright flash in the sky. and many people saw it, and a great amount of people from my area were posting about it all over social media websites. the flash was so bright that it lit up the inside of the house i was in and there was only a small window that was not covered by blinds. my friends said they saw "lightning",(take note that i went outside right after the flash, and there was absolutely no clouds in the sky besides a few extremely small dissipating, barely visible clouds in the sky. this event took place sunday morning february 15th 2015. this is 100% truth and honesty.
content.summary: Looked like a star, no stars out besides north star. moved very slowly, appeared closer than a star, ddnt flash colors like stars, just couldnt look away even if i wanted to

content.detailedDescription: When driving from oxenford town to mount tamborine queensland, sudenly aproximately at few metre of top of trees the brilliant and wovering object quite dificult to observe the shape right because the speed of traveling was aproximately between 60 or 70 kmts. very slow, and sudenly we saw the object seems in fire, but it was extrane that with plenty of trees it was not news of bushfire aniwere. but we are three testimonies that it was a real event.
content.summary: Driving from oxenford town to mount tamborine qld

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard with my dogs and saw a flash in peripheral vision and looked over on the west horizon. low cloud ceiling and breezy at observation. just below the low cloud layer a cluster of small lights moving rapidly to the east. the best decription i can give is me on my roof putting up tangled string of christmas lights with one end plugged in. what would be the tail had 6-10 evenly spaced lights in a straight line then there were 3 rows stacked. the center row was stationary and the 2 outer rows top and bottom had movement but always evenly spaced. the the front had 10-15 lights either spinning in circles and randomly shooting out front making simple to complex 3 dimensional geometric shapes. randomly one of the front lights would race back to the tail and get in line and 1 or 2 from the main body would take its place out front. they would start by orbiting the rest of the lights and then move to the front in making shapes.
the object(s) were traveling at avery high rate of speed
content.summary: Multiple  lights elongated fast

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on 435 e and noticed large object with many lights hovering at a distance. object began to fly to my left as i began to merge on highway 71 s. i observed the bottom of the object, which appeared to be triangular in shape with one blinking light in the center and multiple lights along the edges. as it changed directions the object no longer seemed triangular but more like a cross or a capital t with the upper part of the t being the back. i have grown up in a military family and i have never seen any military craft with this many lights on it.I ,along with other motorist were travelling around 70mph but when object past over highway, everyone slowed down to about 40mph to observe it.
content.summary: Hovering with many lights and then flew away slowly

content.detailedDescription: Going to the store i noticed lights over the river i thaught at a quick glance they were street lights on the bridge but then noticed there were no street lights there were 6 of them they at first were sitting still then they were moving slowly up down right left all over the place they were appearing and vanishing right befor my eyes they were making forms in the sky a triangle they formed 2 triangles we were scared paralyzed in fear and when we pointed at them to the cars behind us they vanished just like that
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We were going across the bridge and seen 6 orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog a couple of streets from my house.  it was 9:05 pm because i looked at my watch when i spotted the object.  my dog, on a long leash, stopped to sniff some bushes and as a few stars were starting to appear in the sky i looked up.  i noticed this very bright light about 80 degrees above the eastern horizon.  my first thought was that it was the space station, as i have seen it about this time of night three times this year.  as i watched i expected it to move as the station moves, but there was no movement and it was brighter than i have ever seen the space station.  i next thought it might be venus, but even venus is not this bright and it was in the wrong place.  after 3 minutes of watching my dog wanted to go so we started walking.  we had gone about 50 feet when she stopped again and i looked up to see the bright light, it was gone.  i scanned the sky and picked it up traveling at a high rate of speed to the southeast.  it disappeared in about 2 seconds above a high cloud deck on the horizon.  i was amazed that it was just as bright when it left as it was overhead. the illumination never varied so it was not reflection of the sun. i don't have any idea what it was but it was not an aircraft as it sat in one spot for at least four minutes and than streaked out of sight in seconds.  i have seen many strange (explainable) things in the sky, but this one leaves me baffled.
content.summary: Saw briliant light hover for 3 to 4 minutes than leave at high speed to the southwest.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving north on the 405 near long beach when we saw 2 fighter jets fly past our car (also heading north).  at first we thought this was unusual, but then we remembered it was president's day, so we just assumed they were on their way to an airshow or something for the holiday.

shortly after (maybe 5-10 minutes later) we suddenly noticed a giant white spade-shaped object hovering over the highway (approximately 1-2 miles ahead of us).  the sky was relatively clear blue with minimal whisps of cloud, so this bright white object grabbed our attention quickly.  nearby airplanes could be seen moving in the distance.  this object did not move for about 30-60 seconds, so we got a rather close look at the object, which did not have any wings or appear to have any windows.  it was solid white with a light grey undercarriage and very bright.

before i could take a picture, the object sped off to the north east (towards the hills) where it ascended slowly for a moment before disappearing in the blink of an eye.  one moment it was there; the next, it was not.

we were both stunned and left in complete awe of this flying object.  both of us confirming with the other that, yes, we actually really just witnessed an unidentifed flying object that did not look like, nor move like any aircraft we have ever seen.

at that point, we started wondering whether the 2 jet fighter planes we had seen moments before we spotted the large white flying object were actually on their way to intercept it.
content.summary: White flying object spotted hovering over the 405 near long beach -it then sped off and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car driving down the interstate when i saw strange colors in the sky. i rolled my window down and began to take pictures of the sky where the colors were. i noticed at the time that there were chemtrails too. later i looked at my photos to see if i had caught the colors in the sky in my photos. when looking at the pictures i noticed orbs.   i also noticed a blue orb that seem to move from photo the photo. i took all my photos in less than a minute.
content.summary: I noticed the skies had colors. i had never seen anything like it before so i rolled my window down and began to take pictures.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs on top of hill at 12:45pm on monday feb.16, 2015 and looked at rain clouds to east.   i noticed dk brown object bobbing out of white & dk silver clouds.  i thought object was a blimp but not on indian reservation.   object seemed to stay in clouds but never came completely out.  the object was miles away so i knew it was huge. ...Aircraft carrier size.   realizing after 2 mins it was a ufo, i wanted to call someone for an additional witness but couldnt take my eyes off since i didn't know what was coming up next.  i gathered myself and took my phone camera out and snapped away as it bobbed out of cloud cover.  it then seemed to change shape rolling in the clouds turning into an umbrella boomerang shape heading north toward durango colorado.
content.summary: Cigar shaped hiding in & out of clouds.  it was more dk brown color.  it then tumbled north and looked boomerang shaped.

content.detailedDescription: Watching my son play soccer and taking photos when i got home put the pictures on twitter and on 1 picture only spotted an object in the picture which is not easily explained
content.summary: Found object  in photo of soccer game

content.detailedDescription: I have been watching 2 fighter jets patrol all morniong, last 3 days to be exact.  all after my first sighting.  other have reported same sighting.  i just saw above my location a red orblike object hover and then leave.  same looking craft!
content.summary: Last 3 days have seen fighter jets circling after my first report.  i just saw a red object hovering above my location, no time to get cell to take phot.  gone in an instant.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in the backyard, i happened to lookup up at the night sky. i saw three large, blurry, glowing white lights in a triangular pattern moving towards the north. no structure was apparent due to the dark and overcast sky, but the shape appeared to be the size of a football field. i watched it until it was obscured by some trees. it was moving too slowly to be a stealth bomber, which i have seen in the area twice before. i heard no sound come from the object and it had no blinking lights, like a regular aircraft. it appeared to be flying pretty low, maybe 1000feet from ground level.

i assume it was an experimental aircraft returning to scott afb, which is about 20 minutes away.
content.summary: Three fixed lights in a triangular pattern moving at a slow constant speed

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work, app 12:20 am. heading south on willowdale ave.Notice two large white lights moving slowly across top of trees, app.1400 feet away to the south east. two large lights under large dark shoe box shape with a light tan colored inverted cone shape on top. a red flashing light was reflecting off of the cone, palsating at 1 1/2 seconds. could not see where the red flashing light was comming from.
 as i was stoping my pickup, i rolled down my window and there was no sound, not even from my noisy 6 cyl. engine. only sound heard was gravel under tires while i was breaking hard. object moved from east to west,app. 500 ft. and stoped. still at tree top level.I looked around to see if anyone else was seeing this, looked in my lunch box for my phone camera, wasn't there. looked for object and it moved to location east of me, app. 250 ft. away. the back of it looked like the front view, including the flashing red light reflacting off the cone. 
ther were two rows of round bumps, three per row, with shadows under each button.
it hovered for app. 1 second and shot to the north, stright line, at a 30 degree angle and disapeared in 2 seconds as the lights got smaller in the distance. 
no moon or clouds at time of sighting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Silent, large dark object, two large lights on bottom, large cone shape on top/light tan color with red blinking light

content.detailedDescription: Seen slowly moving object that looked when moving triangle .When stopped for 30 sec reshaped into something resembling a 4 maybe 5 cubes which moved around a point when i ran for the phone it was not already do not want to give the phone or place of residence because i do not know what to think. it would come to the north of lublin
content.summary: Seen slowly moving object that looked when moving triangle .When stopped for 30 sec reshaped into something resembling a 4 maybe 5 cubes which moved around a point when i ran for the phone it was not already do not want to give the phone or place of resid

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed them about 2 months ago. they skies are literally infested with these rapid moving intelligently guided objects. they flash rapidly with a bright light seemingly "skipping in time" surrounded by a ghostly blue or yellowish glow that i can "see" somehow through things like mountains,walls,cars,people,etc.. this blue or yellowish "aura" also leaves a ghostly glow trail behind. some are red or white definite points of light and can be seen as a black or dark circular dot in the daytime. they seem to be much further than any plane and can zip across the entire sky in seconds. they move so fast at times they resemble a computer cursor with the trail effect on. sometimes i'll see a flash of light like a beam emitting from them that actually looks like its reflecting off the clouds, this to me would surely be visible by anyone i thought to myself but no one else i try to show can seem to see them! how can this be? it is my own strong belief that this  is directly connected to my consciousness "awakening" so to speak because of the fact that others cannot see them and i can also see them through things. they are most definitely there and they are literally everywhere. i even witnessed one disappear in a bright flash in which the color of the flash was different than that of the object. it smashed into this burst of light an vanished. i can see some kind of energy field around everyone of them that resembles an atom. a little point of light zooming around the object in a perfect orbit. i also see this energy when i close my eyes. its almost as if they appear holographic like they occupy a different dimension. a dimension in which they have obviously conquered time-space in order to "move" like that. this new sight has changed my entire belief about the reality that we live in. frankly i am quite shocked. i don't know what to do about it. this is something profound. please help me understand this. i am very concerned and i want to seek the truth for everyone to know but i do wish to remain anonymous as to not draw any negative attention towards me for obvious reasons. please use my email for contact as this is the only real info about me listed above.
content.summary: I see them everywhere all the time. day or night.

content.detailedDescription: I was out back to feed my cats as i came out the back door i saw what seem to be fireballs real low i called for my mom to come look and she got there where now a black triangle ship 50 ft above the roof it was so close you could see it was dull black and it stayed there for 2 min in one place my mom was scared of it so she went back in the house then it went straight and over to the park with lightning speed i went to the front door to go see where it was going and my friend just pulled in the driveway and he said he saw it clear across town and about four days later i was in the backyard when i heard this noise and saw these lights coming to the yard i told my mom to come see this one it was different it was loud and so low it looked and sounded like it was going to crash it was hardly making it over the tree tops it had all kind of weird lights on it and it was a real weird shape and i can tell you if any one wants to see a ufo they are still here up in the sky you can watch them and after a while they will fly down close enough to where you can see them up close and personal i was scared and did not want to sleep or stay at the house because it seemed like it knew you were seeing it and what you were thinking but my mom told me to pray that god wouldn't let any evilness enter the house and so pray and that keeps me safe
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Went to feed my cats and there was a fireball two yards over then it came in my yard

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Several sittings over two days, different craft. began in san clemente's in yard. heard sound like quick jet powering down looked up to see bright white glowing almond shaped craft speed by moving toward ocean, white globs seemed to be dripping from rear. stopped and descended over houses by ocean. my sister heard but didn't see stand our ears popped. was about 2 in afternoon on 11th. next day i was on patio my home anaheim around 4:30pm reading. heard a rushing sound, loud,confused as it sounded like monorail sound and looked up to see huge glowing bright white object like monorail charging across sky quickly disappearing into hole which opened up in sky in front of it. i had good look at it as it entered like a snake into the opening. noticed it was grey like a matched the sky and was transparent. the craft was transparent with a square opening in the rear and could see the clouds or something smoky lingering in the back and could was swirling right through the skin. looked like the skin of craft was fabric like but mesh and the craft curved like a train entering curved tunnel. also it had long shiny metallic appendages in back on both sides like hughes silver talons. i couldn't believe my eyes and was bewildered to say the least. moments later it was dusk, and white clouds had formed suddenly. the craft was slowly floating east and was huge and glowing as bright as the moon and looked like a gigantic shark with huge fins crossing the sky slowly. clouds covered it then it appeared over the weird cloud layer but stationary like a rocket ready for blast off. it moved down where the bottom of the rocket hung below the clouds momentarily and rotated back and forth as if was periscope scanning sky then moved back up to stationary position. clouds covered it and when they cleared it was gone but could see plumed shooting up like it actually had blasted off. was a clear evening with full moon which was as bright as there craft. for two days following kept seeing what i describe as cloud makers. square type dark clouds with round extension like satellite dish which seemed to make cloud cover. saw round lighted craft moving around here and there in same area saw monorail thing but they were small and seemed to be searching. got frightened and moved into the house. was late afternoon still light out and was sitting in a chair looking out slider when quickly a dark helicopter rushed overhead and remarkably stopped on a dime over neighbors rooftop right in front of my patio. i live upstairs by the way and have a great sky view. i couldn't move. just stared numbly at this close helicopter which had two men in it. they had sunglasses and just starred right at me. it was so unreal how it appeared and stopped so quickly and at rooftop height. in a neighborhood. and starred while they seemed to be deciding what to do about this. i was terrified but frozen. just look right back at them frozen. just as suddenly they shot off. i did not have a computer until now so didn't try to report it then. also you feel foolish. however i am now and been so curious to know if people report many from my area and especially around the time of my sightings. i drew diagrams of it all right away so i wouldn't' forget details. i so look forward to your reply. thank you very sincerely, elyse
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Was on patio heard like monorail sound looked up saw monorail type zoom over into hole in sky

content.detailedDescription:
1) went out to the car in the driveway, to fetch products for wife who was at work.

2) noticed an unusually reddish-orange, stationary, non-scintillating light low in the sky.  while some haze existed close to the horizon, it was an otherwise clear night.  orion was in clear view, to my immediate right.

3) thought it was a plane at first, but it never moved for the 10 minutes i observed it.  it absolutely wasn't an aurora, and definitely wasn't any planet i was familiar with.  imagine something the color of betelgeuse, but with a brightness a couple magnitudes brighter than jupiter or sirius.

4) for the 10min i observed it, it remained a constant brightness, and remained completely stationary in the sky.  afterwards, and still without moving in the sky, the bol's intensity became highly variable, and started to flutter out.  i tried to take a picture of it with my galaxy s5 cell phone, but the quality isn't good enough to attach to this report (resolution too low, lots of jpeg artifacts, and low intensity).  a real pity.  :(

5) it was pretty to look at.

6) see 4 above.
content.summary: Red-orange ball of light hovered in sky for ~10min, then faded out as if batteries died.

content.detailedDescription: bottom line is i 2 as take a nap at 7:45  in a hammock in my yard and woke up talking to someone but i  was in a room. soft light and he has not human he told me something was going to happen to the human race and i got upset next thing i remember is i woke up cursing heard by my girlfriend 40 feet away. i know this was not a dream it was real. i just hope they didn't put something in me.

I only caught it for a moment 10 seconds as it moved ne then was blocked by a building very bright violet with a blue violet core object i  have worked in aerospace industry for year and have never seen anything like it
content.summary: Brilliant violet light with a blue purple core moved slowly across the sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was taking out my trash to the curb. i noticed two very very bright lights in the sky. one high up, one closer to a lamp post. i knew they were abnormal by the brightness... there was a humming like sound... like electricity sort of... i took these pictures on an iphone 6. i thought the one by the lamp post disappeared but the picture still shows it.. the one in the sky stayed hovered.. turned into a disk like shape and was blinking colored lights... i don't know how long it was there i was shaking so much and ran back to my house..
content.summary: Ball like then changed shape

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the edge of a small community with an industrial area and farm fields near me. there are very few street lights and my back yard is a good spot for star gazing. it was a perfect night no breeze and in one area of the sky you could see the milky way band. i was scanning the sky to see if i could identify constellations and planets when i looked to the west i saw 2 large bright lights just above a tree row 500 feet from me,but somme distance away i was puzzelled because they weren't there earlier and hadn't been in the sky on previous evening, just as i was going to turn away the lights started moving toward me. startled i checked my watch 10:07 and started a mental check list. no aircraft strobes, wrong air space and to low for instrument flying (because of inhabited community) absolutely no engine noise, at that altitude whether small plane helicopter military jet (to slow) or any other aircraft some engine noise would be heard( i can hear the jet engine noise of jets at 20000 feet as they go by)
 the object slowly moved toward the edge of the community;still no sound the distance between the lights never changed. the fore light was in the white scale like an led the aft was in the more yellow scale like an incandescent.
as it was passing over head i used the faint star light of the milky way to see if it was 1 or 2 aircraft. a good distance in front of the light the faint star light was blocked out and continued to be blocked until after the rear light passed. the light emitted never reached the ground like a search light because i had a good view of an empty dark field it passed over. an approximate size of the lights at the altitude it passed over me would be 10 to 20 feet, its speed no more than 20 mph. i observed it pass over town gain altitude. total time observed 7 minutes.
content.summary: Large black silent 2 large lighted areas fore and aft

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:00 a.M. today, sunday, february 15, 2015, i sighted from behind my home in jupiter, florida, an unusual object high in the sky to the northwest. i followed it with my eyes and was puzzled by the fact that it moved smoothly along like a high-flying plane, but it seemed to be spherical in shape. it shone brightly like a plane reflecting light, but the shining was constant. i rushed around to the front of the house to watch it as it proceeded south, but by the time i got to the front street it had seemingly disappeared from the sky (although i could see the entire area of sky where the object had been headed. then i spotted another object of the same kind (my guess is that it was not the same one) far to the east, over the coastline or the atlantic. it glided south in the same manner as the first object. soon another shining object of the same kind appeared over the northern horizon. i pointed the objects out to my neighbors, who were now arriving in a truck. for the next half hour we continued watching these spherical objects as they appeared and proceeded southward. it would take each object about five minutes to pass from our view (disappearing after moving past us and going some distance. in the course of 45-50 minutes, we saw approximately 9-12 of these objects. there were no sudden maneuvers or changes in direction, although one or two of the objects veered slightly to the east, heading out toward the ocean. some of the objects seemed to disappear (although i cannot say offhand whether that might have been due to the interruption of light reflection). the day was bright and sunny, with only a few thin, cirrus clouds in the sky. air force jets leaving white contrails seemed to be tracking the objects, flying due south along the eastern coast of florida in the general direction of miami. the jets would appear from the north and pass silently overhead at high altitude. 

other witnesses included my wife and four neighbors: a ship captain, his wife, his granddaughter, and a middle-aged male neighbor. we tried to take photos with my wife's iphone, but the lens doesn't appear to have captured anything other than blue sky.

my immediate impression was that the objects seemed to be carried by a wind current and might be some sort of balloons. i phoned the local airport control tower (pbi), the coast guard, patrick air force base, and nasa. a nasa employee told me there had been no launches of any kind that morning.
content.summary: See detailed report.

content.detailedDescription: i was  walking  dogs and  noticed a bright light in  the  sky. it was  not  moving then it moved  very rapidly to the  south than became  stationary again. the  distance was  prob several miles  to the  south then it left at very rapid  speed  to the  south  and  then disappered. i came  inside  and  a friend  of  mine from lummi reservation .Sent  me a message on face book that he  had  just seen something  move in a southern direction at a high  rate of speed. he  thought it was a falling  star maybe. i went outside with biconlars  and  looked for it again. i saw a second object same size to the  north and  as i watched  it it  moved  to the  south at a very high rate of speed looked  triangle to me with white  lights on  top blue lights on bottom.
content.summary: Triangle with white  lights on sides blue lights on  bottom

content.detailedDescription:
My husband walking the dog first spotted 3 objects in the western sky at approx. 6:25 pm as they rose above the house and tree line to the west of our house they appeared to hover with no sound or trail from objects and then took a soft turn to the south and within seconds disappeared, my husband called me out and i did see the the last of the first three disappear. the second set of objects (2) as they appeared again over the same tree line in the very same area as before.I could see they were triangle shape with bright lights on the top and bottom the middle appeared to be a solid dark area, the lights were (i think) 2 colors white and red in a straight line and steady not blinking. either occasion there was no sound or trail from the objects at any time. the second sighting once again rose from the west and again took a very soft left to the south. in each case as they went left they slowly faded into the night. they did not appear to be in any distress etc. there was no wind at the time to make the object turn and as i said they took a very soft and slow turn to the south each time.

there was no way you could not see these bright objects, as they were a distinct brightness` and the movement was so different than any plane could do. we were no in fear at any time, just enjoyed what we were watching and wondering what we were watching?
content.summary: Objects appeared from w and then slowly turned south and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On our way home, coming through jonesborough, i noticed a very bright star like light. at first i thought it might be some sort of light on a tower, as it was more prominent than the traffic lights. 
however, during the 15-20 minute drive home into the country it was apparent that it was not. i pointed the light out to my husband & stepson and they agreed that it was not a star or plane.
the light remained stationary. there was a very dull dim light above it. we even flickered the truck lights at it to see if it would respond.
as the three of us stared at it, it disappeared. the dull dim light remained for a while after and then it to disappeared.
content.summary: We saw a starlike light that was brighter than any stars and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were driving towards the city of cerritos we were on carson and clark (wish are street names) and it was around 12:00am. after that i don't know what happen we woke up in the city of burbank california that was 3hrs later. i can't remember what happen for 3hrs. today february 15th at 7:30 pm pcf time my friend conducted a test with a magnet on the left side of my shoulder bc i told him it hurt it and as you will see something happen when the magnet touch my skin.
content.summary: Have no recollection of time missing

content.detailedDescription:
Family and i driving home from birthday party after sunset .Observed what first appeared to be a lighted christmas tree  at maybe 2000 ft elev . stopped car( live in country no other cars) we all got out and watched took pics with i phone drove in same di
various shapes occurred. round, disc, christmas tree. will send all iphone pics to you but tell me how. not tech savy. thx
content.summary: Family/i driving home from birthday party after sunset observed what first appeared to be a lighted christmas tree  at maybe 2000 ft elev . stopped carwe all got out and watched took pics with i phone drove in same di

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work when i saw a reddish orange orb hovering over
my neighbor's home which backs up to shamrock park. i was in shock and
pulled over by my mail box. i got out of the car so i could get a better
view of it. it flew off in a straight line path to the wnw. because i was
in fear, i drove to the end of my block where my parents live and went 
inside. after i was able to calm down i decided to go outside and drive
around to try to find it. but i was not successful.  therefore, i was
returning to my parents home, when i saw the orb again and it was flying
directly towards me and then it veered away and flew off. i was immediately
afraid again and ran into my parents home.
content.summary: Reddish orange orb plays hide and seek with me
